source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Autumn painting in oil or acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques creating this Autumn landscape painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Learn about Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Learn Professional Magic Tricks & Card Tricks in 7 Days
items.headline: Learn the same type of magic tricks you've seen on TV!
objectives_summary: Learn High Quality Magic Tricks
Build Confidence
Overcome Shyness

items.title: The Ultimate Course for Beginner and Intermediate Crochet

visible_instructors.title: Rita de Maintenon
visible_instructors.job_title: Fiber Artist, Designer, Author, Teacher, Restorations
visible_instructors.name: Rita

items.headline: Learn to Crochet and Discover the World of Crochet Possibilities
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, students will be able to:
Use Materials and Tools
Create a Foundation Chain

items.title: Brother ScanNCut Basics
items.headline: Get Crafty with your Scan and Cut
objectives_summary: You will be able to use your Brother ScanNCut right out of the box.
You will be able to use the built in patterns to create shapes, card mats and embellishments.
You will be able to select and use the appropriate settings when cutting out patterns, stamped images and drawings.

items.title: Mastering drawing and coloring: Beginner to Pro
items.headline: Learn how to draw photorealistic drawing from scratch!
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of hyperrealism/photorealism (perspective, color, shadows, highlights).
How to draw photorealistic drawings with the least colors possible.
You'll use all the shades of the spectrum because each drawing will represent one color and its shades, so you'll be familiar with all sorts of colors.

items.title: A Pro's Guide to Coloring with CLIP STUDIO PAINT!
items.headline: Beginners, hobbyists, students, & pros: learn a complete digital coloring workflow step-by-step from a pro colorist.
objectives_summary: A simple and professional process for coloring line art step-by-step. You'll follow along with the provided line art exercise or use your own!
How to setup your workspace and tools with the proper settings. Downloadable presets for CSP are provided with instructions for installing them.
How to master all of the major tools and sub-tools involved with coloring line art.

items.title: How to Draw Comic Style Artwork - From Sketch to Rendering
items.headline: Learn the Art of Drawing in a Traditional Comic Style Step by Step
objectives_summary: How to Draw Comic Style Art
Understand Line - Shape - Form
Create Dynamic Looking Comic Art with Rendering Techniques

items.title: How to Sketch & Draw People and Figures - For Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to draw and sketch people and figures, based on photo reference or real-life observation. Aimed at beginners.
objectives_summary: Sketch and draw people and figures, from photo reference or real life
Finalize sketches using pen and ink techniques

items.title: Digital Painting in Photoshop: Create Amazing Concept Art
items.headline: Create stunning concept art with Adobe Photoshop and learn the features to aid in that process.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course the students will be able to use Photoshop tools more effectively to create their own digital paintings.
Students will have a firm understanding of how to apply textures through their paintings to enhance the look and feel of their artwork.

items.title: Composition for Beginning Abstract Painters
items.headline: Easy steps to creating great abstract paintings
objectives_summary: Create an abstract painting with confidence
Be able to identify compositions in abstract painting

items.title: Drawing Amazing Backgrounds with Perspective - Step by Step
items.headline: Learn to use Perspective Drawing Techniques to Improve your Background Illustrations
objectives_summary: How to Draw Three Dimensional Backgrounds with more Confidence.
How to Design a Scene in Perspective that is Pleasing to the Eye.
How to Draw a Scene using 1,2, and 3 Point Perspective Effectively.

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Italy Scene in Oil or Acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this Italian street painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Drawing Animals: From Anatomy to Rendering
items.headline: Learn how to draw animals like an expert - quickly, easily and pain free
objectives_summary: Learn basic observation skills and techniques for visualising 3D forms
Learn and understand the fundamental elements of animal anatomy
Develop the knowledge and skills to draw a wide variety of animal species including cats, horses, wolves, eagles and more

items.title: The Drawing Masterclass - Perfect Guide for Very Beginners
items.headline: Develop Your Drawing Skills From Zero To Confident  -  Learn Drawing, Shading, Observing and More - Start Drawing TODAY
objectives_summary: to draw lines with different properties, rhythm and weight
to hold the pencil in a stable and comfortable way
to create an artwork entirely from lines

items.title: Color Mixing Course in Acrylics & Oil Paints

visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Rod

items.headline: Complete Color Mixing Course For Acrylic Painting & Oil Painting - Understand how to mix color in acrylics and oils
objectives_summary: Understand The Primary Colours
Different Palettes - Learn About Landscape Palette
Complete Colour Charts To Further Your Knowledge

items.title: How To Draw BASICS for Kids

visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net
visible_instructors.name: Ed

items.headline: Learn basic drawing skills in a fun way
objectives_summary: Basics drawing skills
Understanding shapes and lines
Basic lighting and shading
